channel.title: none on Matt Browne's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in none on Matt Browne's Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: Every blog has to have a first post right. Well this is mine. The plan is to detail how I have put this blog together with Azure DevOps. That will have to come in a later post because there a good amount of detail to document. I have over complicated it as a learning process (WordPress is just too easy). I’m sure I can complicate it some more, but for now it’s working and I have a space to write now.
